thread.title: Boris Johnson rugby tackles schoolboy in Japan: His other sporting slips
thread.title_full: Boris Johnson rugby tackles schoolboy in Japan: His other sporting slips - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Boris Johnson rugby tackles schoolboy in Japan: His other sporting slips
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Boris Johnson rugby tackles schoolboy in Japan: His other sporting slips 15 October 2015 Last updated at 15:07 BST
London Mayor Boris Johnson recently knocked over a 10-year-old child while playing touch rugby in Japan.
His record in other sporting encounters is similarly wobbly...
Read more Boris Johnson knocks child to ground in touch rugby
